summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on June 23, 2009. The email includes a link to a news article from the Palm Beach Daily News, and it is marked as confidential treatment requested by JPMorgan Chase.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his involvement in the communication.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, suggesting a professional relationship with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein is communicating with Staley, indicating a professional relationship.

The email contains a link to a news article from the Palm Beach Daily News.
The document is marked as confidential treatment requested by JPMorgan Chase.
